Class ConfigurationServiceLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.codeleaf.config.impl.ConfigurationServiceLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationProvider

    public final class ConfigurationServiceLoader
extends Object
implements ConfigurationProvider
    Implements a configuration provider using the java service loader mechanism.

    0.1.0
    Author:
    tvburger@gmail.com

      • hasConfiguration

        public <T extends Configuration> boolean hasConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
        Returns true if a configuration of the specified type is present.
        Specified by:
        hasConfiguration in interface ConfigurationProvider
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the configuration

      • getConfiguration

        public <T extends Configuration> T getConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
                                             throws ConfigurationNotFoundException,
                                                    SpecificationNotFoundException,
                                                    IOException,
                                                    SpecificationFormatException,
                                                    InvalidSpecificationException
        Returns the configuration of the specified type.
        Specified by:
        getConfiguration in interface ConfigurationProvider
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the configuration
        Parameters:
        configurationTypeClass - the type class of the configuration to load
        Returns:
        the configuration of the specified type
        Throws:
        ConfigurationNotFoundException - when no ConfigurationFactory is registered for the specified type
        SpecificationNotFoundException - when the Specification could not be loaded
        IOException - when an exception occurred during opening or reading the Specification or initialization of the specific configuration
        SpecificationFormatException - when the Specification has an invalid format
        InvalidSpecificationException - when the Specification has invalid fields or field values
        See Also:
        ConfigurationFactory, Specification, SpecificationLoader
